name: Footprints of the what animal ?
description:
Are you like Word Game to feel your Brain ?
But need the new idea for GUI or Game Play ?

This is a game for the true Word Genius! It starts very easy but gets challenging quickly and funny.

See the Picture on screen to Find the hidden words, tap your finger over each white character to fill to the green box.
Do it all in the correct way and order and you will be able to clear the hidden row.

With an other Word Game, you are winner this level.

But wait, On Footprints of the what animal ? Word Game, after you clear and fill correct all character, you must tap to spin the Wheel.

After Wheel stop loop you can earn point on wheel piece, but your point can be set to 0 if wheel stop on LOSE piece.

Each 10 Points can use to Remove or Hint one letter.

Try Footprints of the what animal ? now for funny.
